skins.shipDescription: York-class heavy cruiser - York, Hull Number 90!
skins.selfIntroduction: The nameship of the York-class heavy cruisers? That is merely an alias... One day I will conquer the Nightmare of Suda Bay, and become the Master of fate itself.
skins.acquisition: If you were able to find me then you are also a user of the Force, no? I'm York, the the magic-wielding York-class heavy cruiser. Let us fight against Fortune together.
skins.login: Back from your training? Come, Fate is calling for us.
skins.details: Feel free to admire the manifestation of my Force, though this is just the tip of the iceberg
skins.secretaryIdle1: This a special drink I've made, come, drink it and leave not even a drop!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The Force may be essential, but one mustn't drown in its power.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If battles are my destined Fortune then may they be even more fierce.
skins.secretaryTouch: The flow of the Force, can you feel it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Bodily contact holds no significance at all to such a noble soul… Aahh!

skins.shipDescription: This is no mere Upgrade, this is an Awakening! I will alter the course of fate itself!
skins.acquisition: This is no mere Upgrade, this is an Awakening! I will alter the course of fate itself!
skins.login: For us to meet in this place, at this hour... There is no mistaking it; this is fate!
skins.details: If the Force means something, it means having the will to always fight! And I will fight until I've overcome my destiny!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I can feel the Force's power coursing through my body!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I am a genius! I've perfected the Formula... Oh, Commander, good timing! I'd like you to taste this special concoction of mine!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Once I feared the Nightmare of Suda Bay... but now, I shall prove that I can overcome it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Now, grasp my hand firmly! ... Could you feel my enhanced Force?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: W-wait! Continue, and my Force will swallow you wholeC Eek!

skins.shipDescription: The school has recently been consumed by a series of Mysteries... there must be some Mastermind lurking behind the scenes. Yes, another Tribulation awaits me! I shall part the veil and reveal all Truths!
skins.acquisition: The school has recently been consumed by a series of Mysteries... there must be some Mastermind lurking behind the scenes. Yes, another Tribulation awaits me! I shall part the veil and reveal all Truths!
skins.login: Now then, let us begin today's Investigation! The Mastermind will fall into our trap sooner or later!
skins.details: The figure that suddenly showed up inside empty classrooms turned out to just be Eldridge. The mysterious stack of books in the library was nothing more than a Misdirection left by the Occult Club. And, the legends of the Ace who cloned herself to lead every sports club to victory; well, she was actually that incredible... But the Mastermind still hasn't appeared. Has my Investigation been misguided?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Eyepatch? Nay. This is a tool that is necessary to seal off a portion of my Force.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Difficult Words, annoying Formulae... Curses, will I be defeated by these things before I am able to reveal the Truth?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Exeter struggles with her Tests on a daily basis, but that is for the best. The true Tribulations are mine alone to bear.
skins.secretaryTouch: Until all Truths are revealed and the Mastermind's identity is brought to light, I cannot relent!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eeek! Just now, could it be... There's no doubt about it. The Mastermind took over your body to issue me a Warning!

skins.shipDescription: O Unfathomable King of the slumbering depths, hear the call of my Force and step into this world through the Azur Gate! ...Huh, Commander? Why did you show up?
